name: redis
description: MCP server to interact with Redis Server, AWS Memory DB, etc for caching or other use-cases where in-memory and key-value based storage is appropriate

examples.title: Check Redis Connection Status
examples.description: User requests the current Redis connection status.
examples.prompt: What's the current Redis connection status?

examples.title: Store Name in Redis
examples.description: User wants to store their name in Redis.
examples.prompt: Can you store my name "Alice" in Redis?

examples.title: Verify Stored Name in Redis
examples.description: User wants to verify the value stored in Redis.
